entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High 21. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Showers beginning before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
